statements: DELETE FROM client_preferences WHERE client_id = 100 AND first_name = 'John'
DELETE FROM client_preferences WHERE last_name = 'Doe' AND preference_2 = 'OptionB'
DELETE FROM clients WHERE client_id = 123 AND dob < '1990-01-01';
DELETE FROM trading_strategies WHERE client_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM clients WHERE last_name = 'Smith') AND created_at < TIMESTAMP '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM client_trading_prefs WHERE client_id = 1 AND strategy_id = 3;
DELETE FROM strategies WHERE client_id = 100 AND strategy_name = 'Conservative';
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High' AND investment_type = 'Stocks';
